data.title: NAB Reveals Latest Crystal Radio Award Finalists
data.meta_description: The association on Thursday revealed its list of nominees, and the winners will be announced during the "We Are Broadcasters" ceremony held during the 2024 NAB Show on April 16.
data.text:
Who are the finalists for the 2024 NAB Crystal Radio Awards, which has honored radio stations’ outstanding community service efforts since 1987?

The association on Thursday revealed its list of nominees, and the winners will be announced during the “We Are Broadcasters” ceremony held during the 2024 NAB Show on April 16.

Finalists for the 2024 Crystal Radio Awards are:

KBHP-FM Bemidji, Minn.

KCLR-FM Columbia, Mo.

KFI-AM Los Angeles

KGLK-FM Houston

KIRO-FM Seattle-Tacoma

KKBQ-FM Houston

KLTY-FM Dallas-Fort Worth

KMVP-FM Phoenix

KNDE-FM College Station, Texas

KOIT-FM San Francisco

KPNW-FM Seattle-Tacoma

KQMV-FM Seattle-Tacoma

KRAV-FM Tulsa

KRMG-FM Tulsa

KSL-FM Salt Lake City

KTMY-FM Minneapolis-St. Paul

KWEN-FM Tulsa

KXKT-FM Omaha

KYGO-FM Denver

KYW-AM Philadelphia

WBLM-FM Portland, Me.

WBZ-FM Boston

WBZZ-FM Pittsburgh

WCFB-FM Orlando

WDAS-FM Philadelphia WDBR-FM Springfield, Ill.

WDUV-FM Tampa-St. Petersburg

WFLC-FM Miami-Ft. Lauderdale

WHJX-FM Jacksonville

WHKO-FM Dayton, Ohio

WHPT-FM Tampa-St. Petersburg

WJJY-FM Brainerd, Minn.

WKML-FM Fayetteville, N.C.

WLBC-FM Muncie, Ind.

WMAG-FM Greensboro, N.C.

WMBX-FM West Palm Beach

WMMR-FM Philadelphia

WMUN-AM Muncie, Ind.

WNIC-FM Detroit

WNRP-AM Pensacola, Fla.

WOKV-FM Jacksonville

WSB-FM Atlanta

WTAW-AM College Station, Tex.

WTIB-FM Greenville, N.C.

WTMX-FM Chicago

WTOP-FM Washington, D.C.

WUBE-FM Cincinnati

WWBX-FM Boston

WYCT-FM Pensacola, Fla.

WYMG-FM Springfield, Ill.

Additionally, the NAB will also present Hubbard Broadcasting’s KSTP-FM “KS95” in Minneapolis with the Crystal Heritage Award at the ceremony. The Heritage Award recognizes radio stations that have won a total of five Crystal Radio Awards for exceptional year-round community service efforts. Only 11 other stations have received this honor.

The winners will be revealed on the Main Stage at the NAB Show, at 9:30am Pacific on April 16.
